import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cartActions' import './CheckoutItem.scss' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem: { name, imageUrl, price, quantity } }) => { return (
{name} {quantity} {price}
✕
) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ clearItem: (item) => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), }) export default CheckoutItem
